alert.note: Alert for Bolivar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 9:46PM CDT until October 12 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bolivar County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 945 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Trusten Holder WMA, or 12 miles northwest of Rosedale, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rosedale and Gunnison around 1005 PM CDT. Mound Bayou around 1025 PM CDT. Renova around 1030 PM CDT. Cleveland and Boyle around 1035 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Alligator, Winstonville, Beulah, Pace, Duncan and Merigold. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
